msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Puget Sound Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: King County Government, Judicial Administration. Territorial District Court Case Files, 1867-1889

div1.p: In the Superior Court of King County
To J.P. Ronald and R.S. Greene

In the Name of the State of Washington, You are hereby commanded to be and appear at the Superior Court of King County, in the Court Room of Judge IJ Lichtenberg in the Court House at Seattle, at 130 o'clock in the afternoon of the 8" day of May A.D. 1891 then and there to give evidence in a certain cause therin pending, wherein In re contempt proceeding of Alice McKay and Katie McKay Doe Plaintiff and Defendant and to remain in attendance on said Court until discharged, and herein fail not at your peril.
Witness, the Hon. IJ Lichtenberg, Judge of said Superior Court, this 8" day of May 189
By Geo. F. Stanley Deputy Clk
